channel.title: Graham Park's Blog
channel.description: Writings from Graham about whatever happens to be on his mind

item.title: Creating a Static Blog Generator
item.description: Recently I went about revamping my personal site. After recreating my homepage, I decided I wanted to add a blog to it. Below you’ll find an overview of my approach and an explanation of how I created a short python script to do the job. I'm not going to list every detail, but you can all the code...
item.author: Graham Park

item.title: My security suggestions
item.description: I find myself recommending things to my friends a lot (sometimes it’s even because they asked me for my recommendations!), and I get a lot of enjoyment out of recommending things I love. So I decided I wanted to create a series of posts about things I like to endorse. Given my background working in...
item.author: Graham Park
